ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations (Special Edition-2010-06-30)
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS are required as a consequence of Canadaâ€™s Comprehensive Integrated Tax Co-ordination Agreements (CITCAs) with each of Ontario, Nova Scotia and British Columbia. The Regulations formalize and give legal force to the measures of provincial tax policy flexibility previously announced by Ontario, Nova Scotia and British Columbia.
